trans-unit.source: Represents an abstraction of an access control entry (ACE) that defines an access rule for a file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 代表定義的檔案或目錄的存取規則的存取控制項目 (ACE) 的抽象概念。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The FileSystemAccessRule class represents an abstraction of an underlying access control entry (ACE) that specifies a user account, the type of access to provide (read, write, and so on), and whether to allow or deny that right.
trans-unit.target: FileSystemAccessRule 類別代表基礎存取控制項目 (ACE)，指定使用者帳戶，以提供 （讀取、 寫入和等等），存取類型的抽象概念，以及是否要允許或拒絕該權限。

trans-unit.source: This class can also specify how access rules are propagated to child objects.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別也可以指定存取規則傳播到子物件的方式。

trans-unit.source: Use the FileSystemAccessRule class to create a new access rule.
trans-unit.target: 使用 FileSystemAccessRule 類別來建立新的存取規則。

trans-unit.source: You can persist the rule using the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> class.
trans-unit.target: 您可以保存規則使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>類別。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"></xref> class using a reference to a user account, a value that specifies the type of operation associated with the access rule, and a value that specifies whether to allow or deny the operation.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"></xref>類別使用的使用者帳戶、 指定的存取規則相關聯的作業類型的值和值，指定是否要允許或拒絕作業的參考。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create an access control rule that you can persist using the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式建立的存取控制規則，您可以保存使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>類別。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>

trans-unit.source: Access control rules define user account rights that determine which actions are allowed or disallowed on computers running Microsoft Windows.
trans-unit.target: 存取控制規則定義決定哪些動作要允許或不允許在執行 Microsoft Windows 電腦上的使用者帳戶權限。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object that encapsulates a reference to a user account.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref>封裝的使用者帳戶的參考物件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights"></xref> values that specifies the type of operation associated with the access rule.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights"></xref>值，指定作業的存取規則相關聯的類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> values that specifies whether to allow or deny the operation.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref>值，指定是否要允許或拒絕作業。

trans-unit.source: The identity parameter is not an object.
trans-unit.target: identity 參數不是物件。

trans-unit.source: The identity parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The identity parameter is .

trans-unit.source: An incorrect enumeration was passed to the type parameter.
trans-unit.target: 不正確的列舉型別傳遞至 type 參數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"></xref> class using the name of a user account, a value that specifies the type of operation associated with the access rule, and a value that describes whether to allow or deny the operation.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"></xref>類別使用的使用者帳戶、 指定的存取規則相關聯的作業類型的值和值，描述要允許或拒絕作業的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of a user account.
trans-unit.target: 使用者帳戶的名稱。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights"></xref> values that specifies the type of operation associated with the access rule.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights"></xref>值，指定作業的存取規則相關聯的類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> values that specifies whether to allow or deny the operation.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref>值，指定是否要允許或拒絕作業。

trans-unit.source: The identity parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The identity parameter is .

trans-unit.source: An incorrect enumeration was passed to the type parameter.
trans-unit.target: 不正確的列舉型別傳遞至 type 參數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"></xref> class using a reference to a user account, a value that specifies the type of operation associated with the access rule, a value that determines how rights are inherited, a value that determines how rights are propagated, and a value that specifies whether to allow or deny the operation.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"></xref>類別使用的使用者帳戶，指定的存取規則、 值，決定如何繼承的權限、 權限傳播所決定的值和值，指定是否要允許或拒絕作業相關聯的作業類型的值的參考。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create an access control rule that you can persist using the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式建立的存取控制規則，您可以保存使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>類別。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> </xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity>

trans-unit.source: Access control rules define user account rights that determine which actions are allowed or disallowed on computers running Microsoft Windows.
trans-unit.target: 存取控制規則定義決定哪些動作要允許或不允許在執行 Microsoft Windows 電腦上的使用者帳戶權限。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object that encapsulates a reference to a user account.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"> </xref>封裝的使用者帳戶的參考物件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights"></xref> values that specifies the type of operation associated with the access rule.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights"></xref>值，指定作業的存取規則相關聯的類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"></xref> values that specifies how access masks are propagated to child objects.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags"></xref>值，指定存取遮罩傳播到子物件的方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags"></xref> values that specifies how Access Control Entries (ACEs) are propagated to child objects.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags"></xref>值，指定如何將存取控制項目 (Ace) 傳播到子物件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> values that specifies whether to allow or deny the operation.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref>值，指定是否要允許或拒絕作業。

trans-unit.source: The identity parameter is not an object.
trans-unit.target: identity 參數不是物件。

trans-unit.source: The identity parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The identity parameter is .

trans-unit.source: An incorrect enumeration was passed to the type parameter.
trans-unit.target: 不正確的列舉型別傳遞至 type 參數。

trans-unit.source: -or- An incorrect enumeration was passed to the inheritanceFlags parameter.
trans-unit.target: -或-不正確的列舉型別傳遞至 inheritanceFlags 參數。

trans-unit.source: -or- An incorrect enumeration was passed to the propagationFlags parameter.
trans-unit.target: -或-不正確的列舉型別傳遞至 propagationFlags 參數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"></xref> class using the name of a user account, a value that specifies the type of operation associated with the access rule, a value that determines how rights are inherited, a value that determines how rights are propagated, and a value that specifies whether to allow or deny the operation.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"></xref>類別使用的使用者帳戶，指定的存取規則、 值，決定如何繼承的權限、 權限傳播所決定的值和值，指定是否要允許或拒絕作業相關聯的作業類型的值名稱。

trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights"></xref>值，指定作業的存取規則相關聯的類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights"></xref> flags associated with the current <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights"></xref>目前相關聯的旗標<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights"></xref> flags associated with the current <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights"> </xref>目前相關聯的旗標<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule"></xref>物件。
